code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./KetQuaHocTap.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_URL="/api/hocSinh";const fetchData=function(){let keyword=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";const url=keyword?"".concat(API_URL,"?search=").concat(encodeURIComponent(keyword)):API_URL;fetch(url).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setHocSinh(data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);useEffect(()=>{const t=setTimeout(()=>fetchData(search),400);return()=>clearTimeout(t);},[search]);const
